column4: two military officers had an argument on the afternoon of January 31
column9: Kratie province.------A firearm was pulled by at least one of the officers
column10: who were drinking alcohol. The conflict escalated
column11: leading to the shooting of one
column12: who was seriously injured and sent to the emergency room at Kratie Referral Hospital.------The shooter then escaped and police are currently searching for him.------Photos: ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/288009
